data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Krisna Kirkaldy (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Iassinae) from China, with a checklist of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Zhang, Xinmin, Dai, Wu (2008): Three new species of the genus Krisna Kirkaldy (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Iassinae) from China, with a checklist of the genus. Zootaxa 1783: 40-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182383
